mapper.select: SELECT m.flag FROM lea_account_role ar INNER JOIN lea_role_menu rm on rm.role_id = ar.role_id INNER JOIN lea_menu m on m.menu_id = rm.menu_id WHERE ar.account_id = #{accountId} AND m.type = 1 AND m.del_flag = 0
SELECT r.flag FROM lea_account_role ar INNER JOIN lea_role r on r.role_id = ar.role_id WHERE ar.account_id = #{accountId} AND r.del_flag = 0

SELECT m.menu_id, m.parent_id, m.title, m.name, m.path, m.icon, m.hidden FROM lea_account_role ar INNER JOIN lea_role_menu rm on rm.role_id = ar.role_id INNER JOIN lea_menu m on m.menu_id = rm.menu_id WHERE ar.account_id = #{accountId} AND m.type = 0 AND m.del_flag = 0 GROUP BY m.menu_id ORDER BY m.rank DESC, ar.account_id ASC
SELECT ar.account_id, ar.role_id, r.role_name FROM lea_account_role ar LEFT JOIN lea_role r on r.role_id = ar.role_id WHERE ar.account_id = #{accountId} AND r.del_flag = 0
